paper_abstract: In this paper, we consider the following problems: 1. "Let (A) over tilde is a fuzzy number and x a real number. Then, what do we say about whether x is greater (smaller) than or equal to (A) over tilde?". 2. "Let (A) over tilde and (B) over tilde are two fuzzy numbers. Then, what do we say about whether (B) over tilde is greater (smaller) than or equal to (A) over tilde?".
paper_title: Ranking function of two LR-fuzzy numbers
